newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico TIIE 28-day rate falls to 25.9450 pct.
newsitem.headline: Mexico TIIE 28-day rate falls to 25.9450 pct.

text.p: Mexico's 28-day TIIE equilibrium interbank interest rate fell to 25.9450 percent on Wednesday compared to Tuesday's rate of 25.9550 percent, the Mexican Stock Exchange said.
The TIIP average interbank interest rate fell to 25.9069 percent on Wednesday, compared to 26.3821 on September 11.
The TIIE is a market-weighted average interbank rate and revised daily.
The TIIP is a market-weighted average interbank rate revised weekly.
The TIIP is being phased out in favour of the TIIE.
